description: This file serves as the entry point for the production preview build of a Qwik app using Vite. It sets up the QwikCity middleware, imports the server-side rendering function, and exports the configured middleware for serving the app in a preview environment.

methods.name: createQwikCity
methods.description: Creates and configures the QwikCity middleware to handle server requests, integrating the rendering function and the plan for the app.
